Package battle

Interface Gear

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Gear>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGear, Belt, FootWear, HeadGear, Potion
    public interface Gear
extends java.lang.Comparable<Gear>
    This interface represents the gear used in the battle game. It includes the method that is requires for each type of the gear used in the battle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void doNegative()
      This method makes the effect of the gear on a player's ability negative.
      Ability getAbilityAffected()
      This method specifies the ability which is affected by the particular gear.
      int getEffect()
      This method specifies the effect of the gear on the player ability.
      boolean isNegative()
      This method specifies whether the gear is affecting the player's abililty in a negative manner or not.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

    • Method Detail

      • doNegative

        void doNegative()
        This method makes the effect of the gear on a player's ability negative. We have used this method to specify that the particular gear can affect negatively to the player's ability if this method is called.

      • isNegative

        boolean isNegative()
        This method specifies whether the gear is affecting the player's abililty in a negative manner or not.

      • getAbilityAffected

        Ability getAbilityAffected()
        This method specifies the ability which is affected by the particular gear. It must affcet in a positive or a negative way.

      • getEffect

        int getEffect()
        This method specifies the effect of the gear on the player ability.
